Author: grossenten98
Text: A huge protein filled breakfast, then put yourself in a position where you can’t/wouldn’t binge. I did that and it saved me from an awful 8 day binge o thon.   Ik it’s easier said than done but I pulled it off and I’m still alive =] and those were massive binges, I ate 10,000kcal one day ;| I ended up gaining 16lbs but I lost it all and then I gained some of it back in Muscle so victory! 😁  I wish a rainbow cloud of strength and courage upon ye! Xx
